page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: A normal day in my life starts at 7.3Oam. I get dressed go down stairs and have my breakfast. At about a quarter past eight I get my paper bag and start delivering the newspapers to houses. After my paper_round I play with my friend called Martin. About ten o'clock we catch the bus over to Fishguard to go tthe Saturday Cinema Club. When I come back home I have my lunch. Then usually I play on my bike. Later I come in and play with my brother Anthony on his Atari. An Atari is a computer game which you can put cartridges in to play games. After my tea I watch television and go to bed at about 8 o'clock.
